physical.text: Take care of your body. It's the only place you have to live.
physical.author: Jim Rohn

physical.text: Physical fitness is not only one of the most important keys to a healthy body, it is the basis of dynamic and creative intellectual activity.
physical.author: John F. Kennedy

physical.text: The groundwork for all happiness is good health.
physical.author: Leigh Hunt

physical.text: Your body can stand almost anything. It's your mind that you have to convince.
physical.author: Unknown

physical.text: Energy and persistence conquer all things.
physical.author: Benjamin Franklin

physical.text: A healthy outside starts from the inside.
physical.author: Robert Urich

physical.text: Movement is a medicine for creating change in a person's physical, emotional, and mental states.
physical.author: Carol Welch

physical.text: The human body is the best picture of the human soul.
physical.author: Ludwig Wittgenstein

physical.text: Strength does not come from physical capacity. It comes from an indomitable will.
physical.author: Mahatma Gandhi

physical.text: Health is a state of complete harmony of the body, mind and spirit.
physical.author: B.K.S. Iyengar

emotional.text: The best way to take care of the future is to take care of the present moment.
emotional.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

emotional.text: Emotional intelligence is when you finally realize it's not all about you.
emotional.author: Peter Stark

emotional.text: The emotion that can break your heart is sometimes the very one that heals it.
emotional.author: Nicholas Sparks

emotional.text: Your emotions are the slaves to your thoughts, and you are the slave to your emotions.
emotional.author: Elizabeth Gilbert

emotional.text: The greatest revolution of our generation is the discovery that human beings can alter their lives by altering their attitudes of mind.
emotional.author: William James

emotional.text: Happiness is not something ready made. It comes from your own actions.
emotional.author: Dalai Lama

emotional.text: The way you treat yourself sets the standard for others.
emotional.author: Sonya Friedman

emotional.text: Peace comes from within. Do not seek it without.
emotional.author: Buddha

emotional.text: Your present circumstances don't determine where you can go; they merely determine where you start.
emotional.author: Nido Qubein

emotional.text: The only way out is through.
emotional.author: Robert Frost

intellectual.text: The mind is not a vessel to be filled, but a fire to be kindled.
intellectual.author: Plutarch

intellectual.text: Intelligence is the ability to adapt to change.
intellectual.author: Stephen Hawking

intellectual.text: The important thing is not to stop questioning. Curiosity has its own reason for existing.
intellectual.author: Albert Einstein

intellectual.text: An investment in knowledge pays the best interest.
intellectual.author: Benjamin Franklin

intellectual.text: The beautiful thing about learning is that no one can take it away from you.
intellectual.author: B.B. King

intellectual.text: Education is the most powerful weapon which you can use to change the world.
intellectual.author: Nelson Mandela

intellectual.text: The mind that opens to a new idea never returns to its original size.
intellectual.author: Albert Einstein

intellectual.text: The capacity to learn is a gift; the ability to learn is a skill; the willingness to learn is a choice.
intellectual.author: Brian Herbert

intellectual.text: Critical thinking is thinking about your thinking while you're thinking in order to make your thinking better.
intellectual.author: Richard Paul

general.text: Life is what happens to you while you're busy making other plans.
general.author: John Lennon

general.text: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
general.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

general.text: It is during our darkest moments that we must focus to see the light.
general.author: Aristotle

general.text: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
general.author: Winston Churchill

general.text: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
general.author: Steve Jobs

general.text: Life is 10% what happens to you and 90% how you react to it.
general.author: Charles R. Swindoll

general.text: The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The second best time is now.
general.author: Chinese Proverb

general.text: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
general.author: Sam Levenson

general.text: The journey of a thousand miles begins with one step.
general.author: Lao Tzu
